definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: sigh, groan, mostly poet. & late (Aram. [[אֲנַח]], 0enh. Ethp. cf. As. [anâḫu], inḫu, sigh Zim:BP 12, 30)—Pf. 3 fs. [[נֶאֶנְחָה]] La 1:8, Joe 1:18; 3 pl. [[נֶאֶנְחוּ]] Is 24:7; Impf. [[יֵאָנַח]] Pr 29:2 etc.; Imv. [[הֵאָנַ֠ח֑]] Ez Eze 21:11; Pt. [[נֶאְנׇ֑ךְ]] Ez Eze 21:12; [[נֶאֱנׇחָה]] La 1:21 etc.;—
sigh, in token of grief Is 24:7, Pr 29:2, La 1:4 (‖[[נוּגוֹתּ]]) v:La 1:21, Ez Eze 21:11, Eze 21:11; of Jerus. La 1:8; mostly abs. but sq. [[אַל־]] Ez Eze 9:4 (‖[[נֶאֱנׇק]]) Eze 21:12.
in physical distress La 1:11 (‖[[בִּקֵּשׁ]] [[לֶחֶם]]); Ex 2:23 sq. [[מִן]] by reason of (‖[[וׇעַק]]).
